message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to offer it to you at a price of $11000. I think this is a great value considering the product's worth to you.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $10500. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9800. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me, and it's still a good deal for you.

If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $12000.
